vulnerabilities.title: Potential Lack of Rate Limiting
vulnerabilities.description: No obvious rate limiting detected on authentication endpoints
vulnerabilities.recommendation: Implement rate limiting to prevent brute force attacks

vulnerabilities.title: Missing Security Header: Content-Security-Policy
vulnerabilities.recommendation: Add Content-Security-Policy header with appropriate security policy

vulnerabilities.title: Missing Security Header: X-Content-Type-Options
vulnerabilities.recommendation: Add X-Content-Type-Options header with appropriate security policy

vulnerabilities.title: Missing Security Header: X-Frame-Options
vulnerabilities.recommendation: Add X-Frame-Options header with appropriate security policy

vulnerabilities.title: Exposed API Documentation
vulnerabilities.recommendation: Restrict access to API documentation in production

vulnerabilities.title: SQL Injection Vulnerability
vulnerabilities.description: Potential SQL injection detected with payload: '; DROP TABLE users--
vulnerabilities.recommendation: Implement parameterized queries and input validation

vulnerabilities.title: SQL Injection Vulnerability
vulnerabilities.description: Potential SQL injection detected with payload: 1' ORDER BY 1--
vulnerabilities.recommendation: Implement parameterized queries and input validation

vulnerabilities.title: Command Injection
vulnerabilities.description: Potential command injection with payload: ; ls -la
vulnerabilities.recommendation: Validate and sanitize all user inputs, use safe APIs for command execution

vulnerabilities.title: SQL Injection Vulnerability
vulnerabilities.description: Potential SQL injection detected with payload: ' OR '1'='1
vulnerabilities.recommendation: Implement parameterized queries and input validation

vulnerabilities.title: Command Injection
vulnerabilities.description: Potential command injection with payload: | whoami
vulnerabilities.recommendation: Validate and sanitize all user inputs, use safe APIs for command execution

vulnerabilities.title: Potential Lack of Rate Limiting
vulnerabilities.description: No rate limiting detected on authentication endpoint after multiple rapid requests
vulnerabilities.recommendation: Implement rate limiting and account lockout mechanisms
